price: Ní ti òdodo dájúdájú ìwé iṣẹ́ àwọn ẹni burúkú (tó ń dín òṣùwọ̀n kù) kúkú máa wà nínú Sijjīn.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
